sentence.Network_en: Because Buddha and Jesus emphasise effort and Chuang Tzu emphasises effortlessness.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为佛陀与耶稣主张有为,而庄子强调的是无为.

sentence.Network_en: The relations of Chuang - tzu and prehistoric myths are very intimate.
sentence.Network_cn: 《庄子》与神话有着极为密切的关系,对于这一点,许多学者早有体认.

sentence.Network_en: Chuang Tzu someday toured near a chestnut garden in Diaoling.
sentence.Network_cn: 庄子有一天到雕陵私人栗园附近去游玩.
